Key Match Events: Najmul Hossain Shanto scored 54 runs off 48 balls
Shaheen Shah Afridi took 4 wickets for 22 runs
Mohammad Haris scored 31 runs off 18 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Shaheen Shah Afridi was awarded the Player of the Match for his 4/22
Pakistan won the match by 5 wickets (with 11 balls remaining)
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was delayed due to Babar Azam being hit on the helmet
Pakistan maintained their winning momentum in the tournament
Others: The match was played on November 6, 2022, at the Adelaide Oval
The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022-23
